events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

The harsh wind scours the canyons of the Jundland Wastes. Your pilot signals you, "I’ve got our guy on scanner, but I'm also reading a bunch of Tusken Raiders between you and him. So good luck with that."

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.tbText: The Tusken Raiders have brought down rocks to barricade the canyon.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The Tusken Raiders have brought down rocks to block the canyon here.

{-} Barricades are blocking terrain. A Rebel figure can attack a barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None).

The Tusken Raiders have brought down rocks to block the canyon here.

{-} Barricades are blocking terrain. A Rebel figure can attack a barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None).

eventActions.tbText: {-} Neutral mission tokens represent barricades. Barricades are blocking terrain. A Rebel figure can attack a barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None).

The harsh bellowing of Tusken Raiders echoes off the rocks as snipers take aim above you.

{-} At the end of each Round, until the first barricade is destroyed, the Imperial player claims 1 sniper, to a maximum of 4.

You raise your weapons and brave the desert heat, moving towards the Tusken encampment.

{-} The mission will progress when the first barricade is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.shortText: Enter the Tusken encampment. Snipers active: &Sniper Count&

eventActions.theText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent barricades. Barricades are blocking  terrain. A Rebel figure can attack a barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None).
{-} At the end of each Round, until the first barricade is destroyed, the Imperial player claims 1 sniper, to a maximum of 4.
{-} The mission will progress when the first barricade is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
Running as fast as the heat of the Wastes will allow you, you carry both the rescued operative and the officer's data back to your shuttle, leaving the remaining Imperials to the mercy of the enraged Tuskens.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

The banthas and snipers bear down on you. The other Tuskens take advantage of your predicament and grab the operative, taking him deeper into the Wastes. As you retreat, you hear him calling for help that won't come.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
The barricade collapses into a pile of rubble.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The Tusken Raiders have brought down rocks to block the canyon here.

{-} Barricades are blocking terrain. A Rebel figure can attack a barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None).

events.eventText: The barricade collapses into a pile of rubble.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The Tusken Raiders have brought down rocks to block the canyon here.

{-} Barricades are blocking terrain. A Rebel figure can attack a barricade (Health: *2*, Defense: None).

events.eventText: Bask extends one shaking hand, pointing at a particular Imperial officer. “Him,” he says. “He has the data.” You have a new target.

eventActions.repositionText: Block line of sight to the <color="red">Imperial Officer</color>.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Bask Hon'qira, the Bothan operative, lies unconscious, his body battered by gaffi sticks.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the captive to claim his token. If there is an Imperial figure on or adjacent to the captive, that Rebel figure tests {K}. If he fails, he does not claim the captive.

eventActions.tbText: {-} The Rebels win when the <color="red">Imperial Officer</color> is defeated.

eventActions.shortText: Defeat the <color="red">Imperial Officer</color>. Snipers active: &Sniper Count&

eventActions.theText:
{-} The Rebels win when the <color="red">Imperial Officer</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: Up ahead, you see what you have feared: The Empire has struck up a deal with the Tusken Raiders. A man in an officer's uniform grabs a comlink and starts to shout orders.

eventActions.tbText: He has barely finished talking when an almighty roar echoes through the canyon, and a huge beast charges in your direction.
Through the dust, you can see the silhouette of Bask Hon'qira, the Bothan operative, lying on the ground. He stirs feebly, apparently still alive, but seems to be in a bad condition.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the captive to claim his token. If there is an Imperial figure on or adjacent to the captive, that Rebel figure tests {K}. If he fails, he does not claim the captive.
{-} The mission will progress when the captive is rescued.

eventActions.shortText: Rescue the captive. Snipers active: &Sniper Count&

eventActions.theText:
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the captive. A Rebel figure can interact with the captive to claim his token. If there is an Imperial figure on or adjacent to the captive, that Rebel figure tests {K}. If he fails, he does not claim the captive.
{-} The mission will progress when the captive is rescued.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: A Tusken Raider move into sniping position.
More Tusken Raiders move into sniping position.
More Tusken Raiders move into sniping position.
More Tusken Raiders move into sniping position.

The Tusken snipers on the canyon wall bellow defiantly and prepare to shoot.

{-} Tusken snipers will shoot at the Rebels at the end of each Round.

A Tusken sniper takes aim with his cycler rifle.

{-} Roll 1 blue die. {rebel} suffers {H} equal to the {H} results.

A Tusken sniper takes aim with his cycler rifle.

Bellowing and roaring, Tusken Raiders charge.
